roleset.name: intentially ignore social interaction

example.name: both args- ignore someone on the street scenario
example.text: Well i went into a small cafe one time, to buy something to eat, and i saw a friend of mine waiting for his order..we are very good friends, but there has been some time between us, as in work, new friends etc..but as i walked in i acknowledged him and he looked over to me and just blanked me!

example.name: both args, phone call scenario
example.text: I did get to speak to him the last time I rung him -LRB- after him blanking 7/8 calls -RRB- and I asked him what 's up but he did n't tell me -LRB- this was over a month ago -RRB- .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'ignore'.

example.name: argMs
example.text: I do n't wan na ring him any more because I feel insulted that he just casually blanks my calls .
